params.param_note: The details of the task to add. Example: 'Buy groceries'.

Optional due date for the task. Example: 'due:tomorrow' or 'due:2025-01-22T13:00:00Z'. if no due date is specified assume today, also round timings like evening to 6pm etc and if time and date specified convert to time format shown earlier
Unique identifier of the task to modify. Example: 'task 1'.
The attribute to change (e.g., priority, due date). Example: 'priority:H' or 'due:2025-01-25'.
New value for the specified attribute. Example: 'priority:M'.
Unique identifier of the task to delete. Example: 'task 3'.
Unique identifier of the task to mark as completed. Example: 'task 5'.
List open tasks, filtering within due date. Example: 'due:eow' end of week (also used for this week), also due:now, due:today, due:2013-03-14T22:30:00Z(infer time as default 23:59:59Z) etc.
Unique identifier of the task to mark as active. Example: 'task 4'.
Unique identifier of the task to mark as inactive. Example: 'task 6'.
The format to export tasks in. Example: 'JSON'.
Path to save the exported file. Example: '/path/to/exported_tasks.json'.
